website_summaries.verdict: A popular supplement that many repeat users swear by for reducing cholesterol naturally with the help of garlic in an easy-to-swallow pill.
pros: One of the most recognized garlic-based cholesterol-lowering supplements
Doesn't have a garlic taste, and doesn't cause garlic breath or burping
Shape of tablets makes them easy to swallow
cons: Won't produce remarkable cholesterol reduction for all users

customer_reviews.title: Check the Expiry Date on the inside flap
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with an expiry date of May 2019. Someone needs to do a better job of rotating stock. As someone who worked in a hospital pharmacy, we checked expiry dates on a monthly basis. The expiry date on this package is on the inside (sealed) flap which makes it hard to check. I’m hoping the Garlique does what it claims to. I feel like I should return this for product with better dating.
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice 1 pill supplement has most potency and my circulation is better veins more open no question on whether it works or not
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: An alternative.
customer_reviews.text: Every day there are countless drug commercials whose side effects is worse than the ailments they are supposed to be treating. I have been taking Garlique for many years and it is great for blood circulation and overall energy. I'm not saying you are going to do handsprings by taking this, but it has helped me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bing

customer_reviews.title: Will keep on using it!
customer_reviews.text: My cholesterol has never been better. I cannot,for certain, if it because of this stuff or not...but very coinidentaly some to think about.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerRvnwlf

customer_reviews.title: It worked...somewhat
customer_reviews.text: My overall cholesterol dropped from 256 to 212 in about 3 months. However, my HDL and LDL, which had been in acceptable limits, were both worse. I have no evidence that this was caused by Garlique but it was surprising...not in a good way
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Great price but box came in an shipping envelope and looked like it had been ripped apart and sat on. The foil packets were intact & I guess that was the important part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Notice Garlic smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Garlique brand for some time and this is the first time I noticed a garlic smell. I am not sure if they changed their formula, but definitely noticed a garlic smell with the last few boxes I received.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Natural Blood Pressure Reducer
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these to lower my BP and cholesterol. My mom swears by it. I have been taking them for a couple months now. My BP came down within days. Looking forward to my next cholesterol check to see if it worked there as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very garlicky
customer_reviews.text: Claims to not give you garlic taste. Complete and utter horsejocky. Even swallowed fast it hits back of tongue
customer_reviews.author: Chris Assmar

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis relief
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking garlique for arthritis I have in my thumbs and it helps relieve my pain 95% this is like a miracle drug for me I highly highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Saundra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love ordering this than going to the store to buy
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Semi Old Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find them available on Amazon. These are my favorite garlic supplements because of the lack of re-tasting garlic all day & they meet the approval of my Naturopath for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi L. Schlatter

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these supplements 2 months ago, had my cholesterol checked and it dropped over 20 pts! Just received my second batch and will definitely continue taking these, they work!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Item is not eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: We received this item and found that it has a warning not to be used by people on cardiovascular medications. We cannot use the product, but when we tried to return it, we found that it isn't eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great service and value.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and was just as I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No garlic taste
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both like the tablet. There’s no garlic taste and easy to digest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: I received expired product. The expiration date is nowhere on the bottle. The date is located on the inside flap of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Morris

customer_reviews.title: but this is the absolute best, and the price is great
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for at least 20 years and have tried others, but this is the absolute best, and the price is great, affordable!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Weissert

customer_reviews.title: She loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 89 year old Aunt. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: If you want to taste garlic for 3 weeks after taking 1 garlique pill, then this is for you! Never again!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for multiple health needs...
customer_reviews.text: Trusted product to help supplement heart and cholesterol health. Not-too-big tablets coated for easier swallowinig.
customer_reviews.author: Adriene J. Egger

customer_reviews.title: It was as described and perfect for me as I had used the last tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was packaged appropriately and arrived in a timely manner. It was as described and perfect for me as I had used the last tablet of my prior package.
customer_reviews.author: Uzo

customer_reviews.title: GARLIQUE  FOR LIFE .. AWESOME STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Garlique for life .. I cannot think of a better product for heart health, Cholesterol and as a Natural Antibiotic. I would highly recommend this product to anyone! When I feel a cold coming on, I take one along with a good brand of Vitamin D3 and some Vitamin C... and am always blown away that I never get the cold. I recently used it for a bad sinus issue. It's gone now. EXCELLENT PRODUCT! GETS TEN STARS FROM ME!
customer_reviews.author: J S  G

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fine product... the price is great, beats the drug stores prices ...check and compare yourself... they are fresh and have expire dates of 2018
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Garlique Is Odor free and Taste Free!
customer_reviews.text: I like that Garlique is odor free and taste free! My lab studies show that it helps to keep cholesterol levels normal.
customer_reviews.author: Marie W.

customer_reviews.title: Good fo rme
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for probably 3 years and it has helped my cholesterol levels --- plus I really believe you can never have enough garlic!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Demsky

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Product?
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a reeking garlic odor through the mouth after a few hours. We've purchased Garlique at the local pharmacy and used this product before without the odor. Is this an authentic product or substitute?
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I have found
customer_reviews.text: One of the best I have found. when I quit taking these a while back I got sick but have not gotten sick since.
customer_reviews.author: nmac

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Mine is also expired and the pac was crushed in shipping
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Van Gilder

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a terrible stomach ache
customer_reviews.text: Took it a couple of times, gave me a brutal stomach ache each time!
customer_reviews.author: Avid

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: Because I've had a bad reaction from statin drugs, it was suggested I take these to lower my Cholesterol.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of results, bought it to help lower cholesterol.
customer_reviews.author: Edna M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So nice to be able to order this...hard to find in drug stores here.
customer_reviews.author: Marly Bee

customer_reviews.title: Does not do very much, if anything.
customer_reviews.text: Lowers cholesterol by only a point or two, if at all. Could work as a placebo? Really, not worth wasting one's money on. But in all fairness, NONE of these so-called "natural" non-prescription remedies work as well as good old doctor-prescribed statins. It would be nice if they did, but fact is, they don't. Ask your doctor if Lipitor et al, is right for you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lisowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is alright how would I know it for cholesterol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
